I got this set originally back around
column2: Christmas 2014. I believe I got it along side a few Star Wars sets I was given for Christmas. This set is very cute, looks good and most importantly is a great display and play piece.

column1: (Side note, I usually only mark vintage sets that I own as '
column3: , however the Winter Village sets are so good they too deserve to be on my owned list.)

column1: This set comes with two minifigures. The first minifigure is a
column2: very generic little girl with skates, braided hair and a very common jacket piece. The second one is an older, ginger boy (Or perhaps could be seen as the father) with a green jacket and blue pants. On the box he is seen riding the cute little sled.

column1: The set is mainly focused on the small little frozen pond area. Next to it is a black lamp post, a great addition, and a red goal. Kids who are playing with the set can try to shoot the pucks included with the set through the goal. The frozen pond itself looks very nice and it'
column2: s smooth to the touch. Very good to slide your figures around on. There are two hockey sticks available. I especially like how they are brick-built, adding more to the classic charm.

column1: The little ice ramp is one of my favorite inclusions. There are small steps leading up to it where you can slide the sled off. (Obviously) Depending
column2: on how hard you push it the faster it will go down. The ramp itself isn&#39
column3: t too big but can be positioned differently for a different route for the sled to go through. The ramp looks very nice and is a great play feature. There is some small shrub life at the bottom of the ramp.

column1: The only cons I can see is that the snowballs, spare skates and pucks can all get lost easily. I'
column2: m still trying to find where my pucks fell! You can stick them on the build but granted it doesn&#39
column3: t look as good. Oh well.

column1: This is a very cute winter set and is a great way to start off your winter village. The cons are fairly negligible. This set is a great gift for any kid for Christmas! That is why I give this set 5 stars.
